bibl.title: Psalms as Magic? P. Vindob. G 39205 Revisited.
Septuagint and Reception. Essays Prepared for the Association for the Study of the Septuagint in South Africa
bibl.author: ARZT-GRABNER, Peter

bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39205 = P. Bingen 16 (= LDAB 7997). - 1. A Fragment of a Codex Containing Psalms LXX. - 2. The Date of P. Vindob. G 39205. [Second half of V or beginning of VI C.E.]. - 3. The Secondary Use of P. Vindob. G 39205. [The apotropaic use of the parchment fragment remains doubtful.]
ARZT-GRABNER Peter, Psalms as Magic? P. Vindob. G 39205 Revisited.

Johann COOK (Ed.), Septuagint and Reception. Essays Prepared for the Association for the Study of the Septuagint in South Africa = Supplements to Vetus Testamentum. 127 (Leiden, 2009) pp. 37-43, 2 figg.
